invitationTitle: You're Invited to Ani & Agati's Baptism!
invitationSubtitle: Join us in celebrating a beautiful milestone filled with love, joy, and heartfelt blessings.

invitationMessage: We are delighted to invite you to this special occasion as Ani and Agati receive the holy sacrament of baptism, marking the beginning of their spiritual journey. Your presence will add warmth and joy to this memorable day.
invitationClosing: We look forward to celebrating this cherished moment with you!
